pkgmetadata.longdescription: Informative Simultaneous Confidence Intervals // Calculation of informative simultaneous confidence intervals for graphical described multiple test procedures and given information weights. Bretz et al. (2009) doi:10.1002/sim.3495 and Brannath et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2402.13719. Furthermore, exploration of the behavior of the informative bounds in dependence of the information weights. Comparisons with compatible bounds are possible. Strassburger and Bretz (2008) doi:10.1002/sim.3338.
